# properties

**Instance Property**

Returns the metadata properties dictionary of the image.

## Declaration

```swift
var properties: [String : Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

If the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] was created from `NSURL` or `NSData` then this dictionary is determined by calling `CGImageSourceCopyPropertiesAtIndex()`.

If the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] was created with the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImageOption/properties] option, then that dictionary is returned.

If the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] was created by applying [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] or [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIKernel] then the properties of the root inputImage will be returned.

## Getting Image Information

- **definition**: Returns a filter shape object that represents the domain of definition of the image.
- **extent**: A rectangle that specifies the extent of the image.
- **url**: The URL from which the image was loaded.
- **colorSpace**: The color space of the image.
- **orientationTransform(forExifOrientation:)**: Returns the transformation needed to reorient the image to the specified orientation.
